title: Is Practicing Gratitude Toxic Positivity?
description:
We’re living in a nutty world and while we’re trying to balance our lives with work and family and more, most of us are just trying to be happy. I want to share my story about how I changed my perspective to find greater happiness, and I truly hope it resonates with you.

 

On Thursdays, I will be doing a bonus episode where my friends and I will discuss some of our own personal discoveries and opinions on beauty, health and wellness.

And I also want to hear from you. Share some of your aha moments on beauty, health and wellness, and have a discussion. If you're on Apple podcasts, write your aha moment in the comment section. Or you can email me at beautyuncovered@olaplex.com. And maybe you could be chosen to come on our Thursday discussion panel.
